Sentencas: Samarium cobaltite ceramic perovskites, with and without platinum particles dispersion, are possible candidates as electrode for electrochemical conversion of hydrocarbon and for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFCs).
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation

Sentencas: In this work, samarium cobaltites were synthesized by the combustion method using cobalt, and samarium nitrates as cation precursors and urea as fuel.
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation

Sentencas: For containing-platinum compositions Pt (II) acetyl acetonate was also employed as precursor.
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation

Sentencas: The effect of Sr on the phase formation and its electrical behavior is also studied.
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation

Sentencas: Specific surface area (BET), SEM-EDX, TEM and XRD analysis are used to characterize the powders obtained.
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation

Sentencas: Powders were pressed into pellets and sintered in air in the temperature range of 1200 degrees -1400 degreesC. Electrical Impedance Spectroscopy Studies (EIS) are performed on sintered samples.
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation

Sentencas: The as-prepared powders showed an amorphous structure and by TEM a very small particle size (similar to 10 rim) was observed for the as-prepared powders.
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation

Sentencas: At 800 degreesC powders showed the samarium cobaltite single phase with a particle size of (similar to 150 rim).
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation

Sentencas: The impedance spectra showed a transition at 150 degreesC from an impedance dispersion to a pseudoinductance behavior in all compositions.
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation

Sentencas: Preliminary results about methanol partial oxidation showed that H-2 and CO were produced at low temperature (300 degreesC).
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation

Sentencas: Electrical and catalytical measurements prove that these materials can be used as cathodes in electrochemical conversion of hydrocarbon and in ITSOFCs.
Titulo: Ceramics based on SmCoO3-δ prepared by combustion synthesis as catalysts in hydrocarbon partial oxidation
